keystones.stone_long_description: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 consecutive basic attacks will deal 30 - 120 bonus adaptive damage (based on level) and makes them vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 12% from all sources for 6s.
keystones.stone_short_description: 3 attack burst | Teammates deal bonus damage to target.

keystones.stone_long_description:
1.5s after damaging a champion gain 30 - 80% Attack Speed (based on level) for 3s. Attacking a champion extends the effect to 6s.

Cooldown: 6s

Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
keystones.stone_short_description: Tons of attack speed | Exceeds Attack Speed limit.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Attacking a moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized.

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.30 bonus AD, +0.40 AP) and grant 30% increased Movement Speed for 1s.

Healing is 60% as effective when used on a minion.
If the attack that activates Fleet Footwork is a critical hit, Fleet Footwork's healing is increased by 40% of your critical damage modifier
keystones.stone_short_description: Lane sustain | Engage Movement. Think old Warlords.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Excess healing on you becomes a shield, for up to 10% of your total health + 10.

Shield is built up from 40% of excess healing from self, or 300% of excess healing from allies.
keystones.stone_short_description: Excess incoming heals become a shield (includes lifesteal etc.)

keystones.stone_long_description: Takedowns restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 25 gold.
keystones.stone_short_description: Kills / Assists restore health and give 25 gold. Think old Dangerous Game.

keystones.stone_long_description: For 7s after gaining a level or takedown the mana you spend on abilities is fully restored.
keystones.stone_short_description: Level ups / Kills / Assists give free mana for 5 seconds.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Gain 3% Attack Speed plus an additional 1.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
keystones.stone_short_description: Attack Speed stacks from CS / Kills / Assists

keystones.stone_long_description:
Gain 5% tenacity plus an additional 1.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
keystones.stone_short_description: Tenacity stacks from CS / Kills / Assists

keystones.stone_long_description:
Gain 0.8% life steal for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
keystones.stone_short_description: Life Steal stacks from CS / Kills / Assists

keystones.stone_long_description:
Deal 9% more damage to champions who have less than 40% health.

Additionally, takedowns on champions grant an adaptive bonus of 9 Attack Damage or 15 Ability Power for 10s.
keystones.stone_short_description: Execute damage | Kills / Assists grant temporary AP/AD

keystones.stone_long_description: Deal 4% more damage to champions with 150 more max health than you, increasing to 10% at 2000 more max health.
keystones.stone_short_description: Tank killer

keystones.stone_long_description: Deal 5 - 12% increased damage to champions while you are below 60% health, maximum damage gained at 30% health.
keystones.stone_short_description: Extra damage when low health.

rune_description: +11 Attack Damage or +18 Ability Power, adaptive

keystones.stone_long_description:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 2s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 40-220 (+0.50 Bonus AD, +0.30 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 50-25s
keystones.stone_short_description: 3 attacks / abilities burst | Think old Thunderlords.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Enchants your boots with the active effect 'Predator.'

Channel for 1.5s out of combat to gain 45% Movement Speed for 15s. Damaging attacks or abilities end this effect, dealing 60 - 140 (+0.4 bonus AD)(+0.25 AP) bonus adaptive damage.

Cooldown: 150 - 100s. Starts the game on cooldown and goes on cooldown if interrupted while channeling.
keystones.stone_short_description: Movement speed active on boots | Increased engage damage.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Champions, large minions, and large monsters drop soul essence on death. Collecting a soul to become Soul Charged. Your next attack on a champion or structure consumes Soul Charged to deal bonus adaptive damage.

Soul Charged lasts 20s, increased to 300s after collecting 150 soul essence.

Bonus damage: 40 - 80 (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.2 AP) + soul essence collected.

Champion souls - 6 soul essence.
Monster souls - 2 soul essence.
Minion souls - 4 soul essence.
keystones.stone_short_description: Nearby dying large minions / monsters / champions grants burst damage.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Damaging champions with impaired movement or actions deals 12 - 30 bonus true damage (based on level).

Cooldown: 4s
Applies to damage occurring after the impairment.
keystones.stone_short_description: Bonus true damage to impaired (slowed etc.) champions.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

Healing: 18 - 35 (+0.20 bonus AD, +0.1 AP) health (based on level).

Cooldown: 20s
keystones.stone_short_description: Heal when you damage champions.

keystones.stone_long_description:
After exiting stealth or using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport, damage a champion to gain 10 Lethality and 8 Magic Penetration for 5s.

Cooldown: 4s
keystones.stone_short_description: Gain magic pen / lethality when using a gap closer or stealth.

keystones.stone_long_description:
After killing an enemy ward, a friendly Zombie Ward is raised in its place. Additionally, when your wards expire, they resurrect as Zombie Wards.

Zombie Wards are visible, last for 180s, and don't count towards your ward limit.
keystones.stone_short_description: Wards you place / kill spawn a visible ward when they die.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Enter a brush to summon a poro after a brief channel. The poro will stay behind to give you vision until you summon a new one.

If an enemy enters a brush with a poro in it, they scare it away, putting this effect on a 3s cooldown.

Poro channel is interrupted if you enter combat with a champion.
keystones.stone_short_description: Entering a brush leaves temporary vision behind.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Collect eyeballs for champion and ward takedowns. Gain an adaptive bonus of 0.6 Attack Damage or 1 Ability Power, per eyeball collected.

Upon completing your collection at 20 eyeballs, gain an adaptive bonus of 6 Attack Damage, or 10 Ability Power.

Collect 2 eyeballs per champion takedown, 1 eyeball per ward takedown or assist.
keystones.stone_short_description: Kills / Assists on champions and wards grants AP or AD.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Heal for a percentage of the damage dealt by your abilities.

Healing: 2.5% + 2.5% per Bounty Hunter stack.

Earn a Bounty Hunter stack the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

AoE: Healing reduced to one third on AoE abilities.
keystones.stone_short_description: Spell Vamp stacks from unique kills / assists.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Gain 10% Active Item CDR plus an additional 6% per Bounty Hunter stack (includes Trinkets).

Earn a Bounty Hunter stack the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
keystones.stone_short_description: Item & Trinket CDR stacks from unique kills / assists.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Gain 8 out of combat Movement Speed plus 8 per Bounty Hunter stack.

Earn a Bounty Hunter stack the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
keystones.stone_short_description: Out of Combat Move Speed stacks from unique kills / assists.

rune_description: +15 attack damage or +25 ability power, adaptive

keystones.stone_long_description:
Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.

Damage: 15 - 40 based on level (+0.10 AP and +0.15 bonus AD)
Shield: 30 - 80 based on level (+0.25 AP and +0.4 bonus AD)

Aery cannot be sent out to again until she returns to you.
keystones.stone_short_description: Attacks/abilities summon Aery to damage enemies / shield allies.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces it’s remaining cooldown.

Adaptive damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.20 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)

Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
- Single Target: 20%
- Area of Effect: 10%
- Damage Over Time: 5%
keystones.stone_short_description: Hitting spells hurls a comet at enemies.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 3s grants 10 - 40% Movement Speed based on level.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 15s
Additionally, gain 75% Slow Resistance or the duration.
keystones.stone_short_description: 3 attacks or abilities grants speed boost | Think old Stormraider's.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, grants a shield that absorbs 40 - 120 magic damage based on level (+0.10 AP and +0.15 bonus AD) for 4 seconds.

Cooldown: 60s
keystones.stone_short_description: Grants a magic shield when taken to low health by magic damage.

keystones.stone_long_description: Every 75 seconds, your next ability used has its mana or energy cost refunded, and restores 10% of your missing mana or energy.
keystones.stone_short_description: Free spell cast every 60s and mana sustain.

keystones.stone_long_description: Your ultimate's cooldown is reduced by 5%. This number is increased by 2% each time your ultimate goes on cooldown. Stacks up to 5 times.
keystones.stone_short_description: Scaling ultimate cooldown reduction.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Gain 10% CDR when you reach level 10.

Each percent of CDR exceeding the CDR limit is converted to an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power.
keystones.stone_short_description: Free 10% CDR at level 10 | Excess CDR becomes AP or AD.

keystones.stone_long_description: Gain 3% increased Movement Speed and add 8% of your Bonus Movement Speed to your AP or AD (based on level), Adaptive.
keystones.stone_short_description: Move speed | Bonus move speed grants AP or AD.

keystones.stone_long_description: While above 70% health, gain an adaptive bonus of up to 24 Attack Damage or 40 Ability Power (based on level).
keystones.stone_short_description: When above 70% health, gain extra AP or AD.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Your next ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 30 - 60 bonus magic damage based on level after 1s.

Cooldown: 20s
keystones.stone_short_description: Extra Poke damage from abilities.

keystones.stone_long_description: Gain 25 Movement Speed and an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level) when in the river.
keystones.stone_short_description: Gain MS and AP or AD, when in the river.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Every 10 min. gain AP or AD, Adaptive.

10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD
40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 101 AD
etc...
keystones.stone_short_description: Every 10 minutes gain stacking AP or AD.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:

  • Deal bonus damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heal you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

Ranged Champions: Damage and healing are halved and gain 2 permanent health instead.
keystones.stone_short_description: Bonus damage / heal based on max health. Permanent max health.

keystones.stone_long_description:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your current Armor and Magic Resist by 10 + 30% for 2.5s. Then, after 2.5s deal magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 40-140 (+3.5% your maximum health)
Cooldown: 20s
keystones.stone_short_description: Immobilizations grant Armor / MR and casts explosion based on health.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Guard allies within 175 units of you, and Guard allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally would take damage, both of you gain a shield and are hasted for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 45s
Shield Strength: 60 - 150 (+0.20 AP) (+10% bonus health).
Haste: 20% increased Movement Speed
keystones.stone_short_description: Haste and shield allies you are near or cast a spell on.

keystones.stone_long_description: Increase your Tenacity and Slow Resistance by 10% for each Summoner Spell on cooldown. After casting a Summoner Spell, gain 15% additional Tenacity and Slow Resistance for 10s.
keystones.stone_short_description: Tenacity and slow resist based on summoner skill cooldown/usage.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Charge up a powerful attack against a tower over 4s, when within 600 range of it. The charged attack deals 125 (+30% of your max health) bonus physical damage.

Cooldown: 45s
keystones.stone_short_description: Tower burst damage based on max health.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them for 4s.

Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for 5 + 1% of your max health.
keystones.stone_short_description: Allies heal when attacking enemies you impair | Think old Stoneborne Pact.

keystones.stone_long_description: Gain 5 Armor. Whenever you heal for at least 20 health or from a consumable's effect, increase your Armor by 5% for 3 seconds.
keystones.stone_short_description: +5 Armor | Healing increase Armor temporarily.

keystones.stone_long_description: Gain 6 Magic Resist. Whenever you heal for at least 20 health or from a consumable's effect, increase your Magic Resist by 5% for 3 seconds.
keystones.stone_short_description: +5 MR | Healing increase MR temporarily.

keystones.stone_long_description: After 10 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your total Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.
keystones.stone_short_description: After 10 minutes gain Armor and MR.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Every 8 monsters or enemy minions that die near you permanently increases your max health by 0.2%.

Range: 1400 units
keystones.stone_short_description: Minions that die nearby give max health.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Heals and shields are 5% stronger and increased by an additional 10% on targets below 40% health.

*Include heals and shields cast on yourself*
keystones.stone_short_description: Stronger heals and shields.

keystones.stone_long_description: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal for 4% of your missing health over 10 seconds.
keystones.stone_short_description: Getting hit restores missing health over time.

rune_description:
Inspiration + Resolve: +20% Potion and Elixir Duration +145 Health
Inspiration + Domination: +20% Potion and Elixir Duration +16 Attack Damage or +27 Ability Power,adaptive
Inspiration + Sorcery: +20% Potion and Elixir Duration +16 Attack Damage or +27 Ability Power, adaptive
Inspiration + Precision: +20% Potion and Elixir Duration +20% Attack Speed

keystones.stone_long_description:
Gain a Summoner Shard at 2 minutes and another every 6 min after (max 2 shards).

While near the shop, you can exchange 1 Summoner Shard to replace a Summoner Spell with a different one.

Additionally, your Summoner Spell cooldowns are reduced by 25%.

Smite: Buying Smite won't grant access to Smite items
You cannot have two of the same Summoner Spell
keystones.stone_short_description: Swap summoner spells in game. 25% Summoner CDR.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Basic attacking a champion slows them for 2s. The slow increases in strength over its duration.

  • Ranged attacks slow by up to 20%-40%
  • Melee attacks slow by up to 40%-50%

Slowing a champion with active items shoots a freeze ray through them, freezing the nearby ground for 5s, slowing all units inside by 50%

Cooldown: 7-4s second per-unit cooldown
keystones.stone_short_description: Slow enemies on hit. Active slows cast AoE slow.

keystones.stone_long_description: After using an ability, your next attack on a champion grants bonus gold. There's a chance you'll also gain a consumable.
keystones.stone_short_description: Attacks after spells on champions grant gold and consumables | Procs like Sheen.

keystones.stone_long_description:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel for 2.5 seconds to blink to a new location.

Cooldown: 20 seconds. Goes on a 10 second cooldown when you enter champion combat.
keystones.stone_short_description: Gain a channel flash while flash is on cooldown.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Biscuit Delivery: Gain a Total Biscuit of Everlasting will every 3 minutes, until 12 minutes.

Biscuits restore 15% of your missing health and mana and increase your mana cap by 40 mana permanently.

Champions without mana restore 20% missing energy instead.
keystones.stone_short_description: Periodically gain a biscuit with strong Health/Mana regen.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Start the game with a Commencing Stopwatch that transforms into a Stopwatch after 6 min. Stopwatch has a one time use Stasis active.

Reduces the cooldown of Zhonyas Hourglass, Guardian Angel, and Gargoyle's Stoneplate by 15%.
keystones.stone_short_description: After 6 minutes gain a one-time use Zhonya’s active.

keystones.stone_long_description: You get Slightly Magical Boots at 10 min, but you cannot buy boots before then. For each takedown you acquire the boots 30s sooner.
keystones.stone_short_description: Free boots at 10 minutes.

keystones.stone_long_description:
You can enter debt to buy items. The amount you can borrow increases over time.

Debt limit: 150 + 5/min
Lending Fee: 50 gold per item
keystones.stone_short_description: Enter debt to buy items early.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Start the game with 6 Minion Dematerializers that kill and absorb lane minions instantly. Minion Dematerializers are on cooldown for the first 155s of the game.

Absorbing a minion increases your damage by +4% against that type of minion permanently, and an extra +1% for each additional minion of that type absorbed.
keystones.stone_short_description: Kill 6 minions for free and gain bonus minion damage.

keystones.stone_long_description:
+5% CDR
+5% Max CDR
+5% Summoner Spell CDR
+5% Item CDR
keystones.stone_short_description: 5% CDR for spells, Summoners, Items, and max CDR.

keystones.stone_long_description:
Gain 10% Movement Speed towards nearby allies that are movement impaired or enemies that you impair.

Range: 1000
keystones.stone_short_description: Movement speed towards impaired allies / enemies.

keystones.stone_long_description:
+100 Health permanently
-10% damage to champions and monsters until 10 mins.
keystones.stone_short_description: +100 health | Less damage until 10 minutes.
